title: BattleBots FaceOffs
overview: Get ready for an unforgettable showdown in Las Vegas this September â€“ December! BattleBots Destruct-A-Thon is bringing you a series of World Championship VIII pre-qualifier events featuring the biggest names in robotic combat. Each weekend, four elite teams will face off in intense round-robin battles, showcasing their unrivaled fighting prowess. Witness the most feared robots in the sport go head-to-head with rising stars. All the action will be available on our YouTube channel, with early access exclusively for our Facebook Supporters.
